content.raw:
@scpeters showed me a problem:

1. Open Gazebo and View -> Joints

1. Insert several double pendulums

Some of the joint visuals for the pendulums will show up tiny. After some digging I found out that this is happening because the joint msg may be processed before the visual msgs. So when we get the link's bounding box to check its size and scale the joint visual, the box has size zero due to the lack of visuals. I'm trying to fix this.
content.html:
@scpeters showed me a problem:

  1. Open Gazebo and View -> Joints

  2. Insert several double pendulums

Some of the joint visuals for the pendulums will show up tiny. After some digging I found out that this is happening because the joint msg may be processed before the visual msgs. So when we get the link's bounding box to check its size and scale the joint visual, the box has size zero due to the lack of visuals. I'm trying to fix this.
